T02D2514:287b-1: m'a ya dz'a la tantra r'a dza panydzi ka / bod skad du /
T02D2514:287b-2: rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dka' 'grel /
T02D2514:287b-3: bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2514:287b-4: sgyu 'phrul dra ba dri ma sel mdzad pa //
T02D2514:287b-5: thabs dang shes rab las byung phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2514:287b-6: de yi rtogs par dka' ba'i tshig bshad pa //
T02D2514:287b-7: dran par bya ba'i phyir ni bri bar bya //
T02D2514:287b-8: 'dir de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu ni gtso
T02D2514:287b-9: bo yin pas yang dag par brjod par bya ba
T02D2514:287b-10: yin la / ji srid bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2514:287b-11: snang mdzad chen po 'di gdul bya'i skye bo rnams
T02D2514:287b-12: ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su gzung bar bya
T02D2514:287b-13: ba'i phyir byung bar gyur pas 'grel pa la sogs
T02D2514:287b-14: pa gsum ni don gyi dbang gis ston par 'gyur
T02D2514:287b-15: yin la / ro // 'dir sdud par byed pa
T02D2514:287b-16: phyag na rdo rje tshad ma nyid yin par bstan
T02D2514:287b-17: par bya ba'i phyir gleng gzhi bshad pa smras pa
T02D2514:287b-18: ni 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2514:287b-19: yin la / ro // / 'di skad ces bya
T02D2514:287b-20: ba ni rgyud kyi don thams cad ston pa'i tshig
T02D2514:287b-21: yin la / ro // / gi phrad do //
T02D2514:287b-22: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du thos
T02D2514:287b-23: kyis rtogs pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D2514:287b-24: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni gzhan du gzhan
T02D2514:287b-25: dag thos pa ste bdag nyid thos ba mang por
T02D2514:287b-26: ston to // bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D2514:287b-27: ni mi shes pa spang ba phun sum tshogs pa'o
T02D2514:287b-28: ston to // // khang pa brtsegs pa'i zhes bya
T02D2514:287b-29: ba la sogs pas ni me long lta bu dang
T02D2514:287b-30: mnyam pa nyid dang so sor kun du rtog pa
T02D2514:287b-31: dang bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas
T02D2514:287b-32: gnas phun sum tshogs ba ste /
T02D2514:287b-33: 'di dag gis bdag gi phun sum tshogs pa bstan
T02D2514:287b-34: nas gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bstan
T02D2514:287b-36: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2514:287b-37: gsungs te rdo rje 'khor los rab tu spras pa'i
T02D2514:287b-38: cha byad sna tshogs 'chang pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2514:287b-39: la sogs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi cha
T02D2514:287b-40: lugs bsgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i
T02D2514:287b-41: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pas zhes bya ba'i
T02D2514:287b-42: bar du'o // rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhes bya
T02D2514:287b-43: ba la sogs pas ni gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i
T02D2514:287b-44: thabs phun sum tshogs pa ste rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2514:288a-1: de las byung bas na rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po las byung pa'o //
T02D2514:288a-2: sna tshogs ni don yod grub pa'i dbang phyug go //
T02D2514:288a-3: rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D2514:288a-4: rin po che ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D2514:288a-5: thabs dang shes rab dag gis rnam par rol pa
T02D2514:288a-6: bstan par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa zhes bya ba
T02D2514:288a-8: spyod pa ni la la dag gis thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dod do //
T02D2514:288a-9: spyad pa spyod pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi'i padma'i go skabs nas sam /
T02D2514:288a-10: stong ba nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i
T02D2514:288a-11: sgo bzhi'i ngo bo'i rdo rje'i go skabs nas byung
T02D2514:288a-12: ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs
T02D2514:288a-13: la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams kyis
T02D2514:288a-15: mdun gyis bltas pa zhes bya ba ni gtso bor byas pa'o //
T02D2514:288a-16: thugs rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems can
T02D2514:288a-17: thams cad bsgral bal mngon par brtson par mdzad pa
T02D2514:288a-18: ni bshad ma thag pa nyid kyi rgyud bstan pa
T02D2514:288a-19: yin no // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2514:288a-20: pa ni rgyud kyi don nye bar ston te sgyu
T02D2514:288a-21: 'phrul gyi dra ba ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2514:288a-22: la sogs pa ste kun rdzob yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D2514:288a-23: yin no // // ye shes chen pos rnam par
T02D2514:288a-24: bsgyings pa ni byang chub kyi sems las byung ba'i
T02D2514:288a-25: yin no // // phyir ro // sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu'o //
T02D2514:288a-26: rol pas zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab
T02D2514:288a-27: dag gi rnam par 'phrul pas rol cing rtse ba'o
T02D2514:288a-28: // stang stabs kyis zhes bya ba ni g-yas brkyang
T02D2514:288a-29: ba la sogs pa'i stang stabs rnams kyis mi mthun
T02D2514:288a-30: pa'i phyogs thams cad rnam par 'jig pa yin pas
T02D2514:288a-31: na stang stabs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02D2514:288a-32: thabs dang shes rab las byung ba ni byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid can bde ba chen po'o //
T02D2514:288a-33: de las rdo rje ni dam tshig la sogs pa ste /
T02D2514:288a-34: de ni gdul bya'i skye bo rnams sgrol bar byed pas ni sgrol ba'o //
T02D2514:288a-35: de lta bu'i rol bas bzhad pa ston ba'i rnam
T02D2514:288a-36: par 'phrul pa ting nge 'dzin gang du ston pa
T02D2514:288a-37: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2514:288a-38: ye shes rgya mtsho che ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D2514:288a-39: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen sbyin ni don yong
T02D2514:288a-40: par grub pa ste de ni yid bzhin gyi nor
T02D2514:288a-41: bu rin po che dang 'dra bar bla na med
T02D2514:288a-42: pa'i mchod pa'i don rdzogs par byed bas so //
T02D2514:288b-0: @288b rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u dang po'i bshad pa'o /
T02D2514:288b-2: // / rnam par snang mdzad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
T02D2514:288b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po bstan par bya
T02D2514:288b-4: ba'i phyir / de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:288b-5: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i ye shes ni spyan la sogs
T02D2514:288b-6: pa'i lha mo bskyad pa'i byang chub kyi sems te
T02D2514:288b-8: gsang ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02D2514:288b-9: de nyid phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi gnas
T02D2514:288b-10: su gyur pas na byin gyi rlabs kyi mchog go
T02D2514:288b-11: // mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2514:288b-12: de ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de
T02D2514:288b-13: la'ang de skad ces bya ste de la snyoms par
T02D2514:288b-14: zhugs pa'o // ye shes chen po ni byang chub kyi sems te de nyid 'bar ba'o //
T02D2514:288b-15: 'di nyid kyi snying po can gang yin pa ni rdo rje'i ste dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyi'o //
T02D2514:288b-16: de nyid ni snying po ste de rnams kyi 'byung gnas so //
T02D2514:288b-17: grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni
T02D2514:288b-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing che ge mo zhes bya bar
T02D2514:288b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur ro
T02D2514:288b-20: zhes grangs su 'gro bar mkhyen par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2514:288b-22: dang po kho nar sa yongs su gzung bar bya'o
T02D2514:288b-23: zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te
T02D2514:288b-24: / dang por ji skad bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D2514:288b-25: ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i
T02D2514:288b-26: / sa gzhir / rnam par snang mdzad ji lta
T02D2514:288b-27: ba bzhin du gyur nas gdan bzhir rang gi lha'i
T02D2514:288b-28: gzugs spro ba la sogs pas bsgoms la sprul pa'i
T02D2514:288b-29: / sa gzhir / sprin phyung ste / de dag
T02D2514:288b-30: nyid kyis phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2514:288b-31: pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la khyed rnams kyis
T02D2514:288b-32: 'dir byin gyis brlab pa la brtson par mdzod cig
T02D2514:288b-33: ces gsol bar bsam zhing slob dpon dang slob ma
T02D2514:288b-34: de srung bar mdzod cig ces bskul la /
T02D2514:288b-35: de nas de dag yang dag par bsdus te /
T02D2514:288b-36: nang du bsgoms nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i
T02D2514:288b-37: rdo rje'i lte ba'i yi ge h'um gi nang du
T02D2514:288b-39: de las byung ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku rang gi rig pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2514:288b-40: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gcig tu gyur bar byas nas /
T02D2514:288b-41: yi ge gsum la sogs pas byin gyis brlab pa
T02D2514:288b-42: sngon du 'gro bas lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje
T02D2514:288b-43: gsor la g-yon dkur brten pas rdo rje dril bu
T02D2514:289a-1: rkang pa'i 'og tu h'um bkod pa las rdo rje 'bar ba phyung ste /
T02D2514:289a-2: rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang bcas pa'i khro bo'i nga
T02D2514:289a-3: rgyal dang ldan pas yi ge h'um brjod pa sngon
T02D2514:289a-5: slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya ba la sogs brjod nas /
T02D2514:289a-6: rang gi rdo rje las khro bo'i lus phyung ste /
T02D2514:289a-7: myur ba nyid du rdo rje'i 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor
T02D2514:289a-8: gyis kun du bskor nas gdug pa can thams cad
T02D2514:289a-10: de lta bus ni sa gzhi yongs su gzung ba byas par gyur pa yin no //
T02D2514:289a-11: nyi ma gnyis pa la dkyil 'khor bri ba 'byung
T02D2514:289a-12: bar 'gyur bas g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i stang
T02D2514:289a-13: stabs la rnam par gnas pas /
T02D2514:289a-14: ji lta bzhin du mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dkyil
T02D2514:289a-15: 'khor gyi sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin
T02D2514:289a-16: gyis brlab po // g-yas brkyang ba ni g-yon pa'i
T02D2514:289a-17: byin pa bskum la g-yas pa rgyar mtho lngar brkyang
T02D2514:289a-19: g-yon brkyang ba ni g-yon de bzhin du brkyang ba ste /
T02D2514:289a-20: 'di gnyis la ni rang gi ming smos pa sngon
T02D2514:289a-21: du 'gro bas h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra 'od zer
T02D2514:289a-22: 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas 'khrigs ba rnams kyis
T02D2514:289a-23: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i gtan pa la thug gi
T02D2514:289a-24: bar du khyab par bsams la /
T02D2514:289a-25: rdo rje gsor zhing khro bo'i lta ba dang ldan pas kun du bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2514:289a-26: lhag ma rnams la ni ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2514:289a-27: sa ga'i 'dug stangs ni rkang pa'i phyi rol gyi
T02D2514:289a-28: sor mo'i bar rgyar sor nyi shu rtsa drug gis
T02D2514:289a-31: zlum po'i 'dug stangs kyang de nyid las lag ba gnyis rgyar dang pa'i gshog pa ltar byas pa'o //
T02D2514:289a-32: mthun pa'i rkang stabs ni rkang pa gnyis phan tshun du mthe bo dang long mo bcer ba'o //
T02D2514:289a-33: rus sbal gyi rkang stabs ni rkang pa g-yas pas rkang pa g-yon pa mnan pa'o //
T02D2514:289a-34: rdo rje 'degs pa ni rdo rje snying gar 'degs pa'o //
T02D2514:289a-35: rdo rje 'jo tshul ni rdo rje nyid sgeg pa dang bcas pas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D2514:289a-36: rkang pa ya gcig gi stang stabs ni rkang pa
T02D2514:289a-37: gcig bteg la rkang pa ya gcig gis 'gro ba'o
T02D2514:289a-38: // bung ba'i 'phur stangs ni lus kun du bskor ba'o //
T02D2514:289a-39: seng ge'i lta thabs ni g-yas brkyang bas rang gi kha gdangs la /
T02D2514:289b-0: lag pa g-yon @289b pa'i mkhrig ma'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ba'i mkhrig ma sbyar ba'o //
T02D2514:289b-1: seng ge'i glal ba ni 'di nyid las rgyab tu lta bar byed pa'o //
T02D2514:289b-2: rdo rje dral ba ni snying gar rdo rje bcing ba byed pa'o //
T02D2514:289b-3: rdo rje gsor ba ni lag pa gnyis kyis rdo
T02D2514:289b-4: rje bskor nas 'og tu rdo rje yongs su bskor
T02D2514:289b-7: rdo rje'i stang stabs ni rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2514:289b-8: rdo rje gar ni rdo rje dang gar byas pas lag pa g-yon pa brkyang la /
T02D2514:289b-9: de'i rtsa bar g-yas pa ba dan gsum par byas pas 'di 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2514:289b-10: rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba ni kha'i steng nas
T02D2514:289b-11: 'og tu lag pa brkyang nas de nyid 'jigs byed
T02D2514:289b-13: rdo rje ro langs ma ni lag pa gnyis kyis ro blangs la zab ltar byed cing 'gro ba'o //
T02D2514:289b-14: rdo rje tho ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis thob brdeg pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02D2514:289b-15: sgo bzhi byin gyis brlab pa ni shar la sogs
T02D2514:289b-16: pa'i phyogs su sa gnon pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan
T02D2514:289b-17: pas stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnam par thar
T02D2514:289b-19: rdo rje'i gdu bu ni skor phyogs su song ste rim gyis sa gzhir rkang pa gnyis 'jog pa'o //
T02D2514:289b-20: bud med kyi sgyu 'phrul gyi stang stabs ni /
T02D2514:289b-21: rdo rje gar sngon du 'gro bas lag pa gnyis
T02D2514:289b-22: ka dkur brten la mgo g-yon du 'dud par byas
T02D2514:289b-23: pa'o // rdo rje stobs po che'i 'degs pa ni /
T02D2514:289b-24: snying gar lag pa g-yon pas rdo rje rtse gsum
T02D2514:289b-25: par byas la g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur dbyug
T02D2514:289b-27: rdo rje mche ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi
T02D2514:289b-28: mthe'u dag bzlog la kha'i grva mche bltar byas nas
T02D2514:289b-29: lce bskyod cing khro ba'i lta bas blta ba'o //
T02D2514:289b-30: rdo rje'i gad mo ni ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra yang dang yang du byed pa'o //
T02D2514:289b-31: rdo rje'i sgra ni rdo rje'i dril bu 'khrol ba'o //
T02D2514:289b-32: ral gri'i stabs ni g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi shugs
T02D2514:289b-33: las drangs nas g-yas pa'i khu tshur ral gri'i tshul
T02D2514:289b-34: du gzhag pa'o // rdo rje'i stabs ni g-yas pas rdo rje rtse gsum pa 'degs pa'o //
T02D2514:289b-35: 'khor lo'i stabs ni snying gar rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2514:289b-36: gnyis kyi mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo rdo rje 'dud
T02D2514:289b-37: pa byas la 'khor lo ltar gtong ba'o //
T02D2514:289b-38: gtun shing gi stabs ni rdo rje bcings pas gtun shing 'dzin pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2514:290a-0: ba dan gyi stabs ni lag @290a * //
T02D2514:290a-1: pa g-yas pa'i mthe bos srin lag gi sen mo mnan la /
T02D2514:290a-2: sor mo lhag ma rnams brkyang nas g-yas pa'i dpung pa'i thad kar gzhag pa'o //
T02D2514:290a-3: zhags pa'i stabs ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya nyid do //
T02D2514:290a-4: padma'i tshul ni thal mo sbyar ba padma ltar phye ba'o //
T02D2514:290a-5: be con gyi tshul ni g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe bo nang nas bton te bsgreng ba'o //
T02D2514:290a-6: mi 'jigs pa'i tshul ni lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02D2514:290a-7: lcags kyu'i stabs ni lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo 'gugs pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02D2514:290a-8: gshol gyi tshul ni lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo brkyang nas cung zad bskum pa'o //
T02D2514:290a-9: mdung thung gi stabs ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis bsnun pa ltar byed pa'o //
T02D2514:290a-10: gzhu'i stabs ni lag pa g-yon pas gzhu 'dzin pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2514:290a-11: mda' gzung ba'i stabs ni lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub
T02D2514:290a-12: mo dang gung mo gnyis kyis mda' blangs la gsor
T02D2514:290a-14: mda' gsor ba'i stabs ni de dag nyid kyis mda' 'phen pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02D2514:290a-15: thag mdung bskor ba'i stabs ni lag pa g-yas pa'i
T02D2514:290a-16: khu tshur gyis thag mdung yongs su bskor ba'i tshul
T02D2514:290a-17: du byed pa'o // mchog sbyin ba'i stabs ni lag
T02D2514:290a-18: pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du bzhag pa'o
T02D2514:290a-19: du byed pa'o // // mdung thung gi stabs ni
T02D2514:290a-20: lag pa g-yas pas gsor ba sngon du 'gro bas
T02D2514:290a-21: mdung thung 'phen pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02D2514:290a-22: mtshon rtse gcig pa'i stabs ni mdung rtse gcig pa 'phen pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2514:290a-23: phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul ni thal mo sbyar nas bstod pa byed pa'i tshul du snying gar 'jog pa'o //
T02D2514:290a-24: bsam gtan gyi tshul ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya de nyid de /
T02D2514:290a-25: stang stangs de rnams kyis khro bo 'byin pa sngon
T02D2514:290a-26: du 'gro bas bgegs thams cad rnam par gzhom par
T02D2514:290a-27: bya'o // de nas rdo rje skyil mo krung la
T02D2514:290a-28: sogs pa rnams kyis dbus su 'dug la h'um zhes
T02D2514:290a-29: brjod cing sa'i cha rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'bar ba
T02D2514:290a-30: rnam par gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2514:290a-31: padma'i 'dug stangs ni g-yas pa'i byin pas g-yon pa mnan la phus mo gnyis phab pa'o //
T02D2514:290a-33: stan la rkang pa gnyis drang por 'jog pa'o //
T02D2514:290b-0: @290b rtse ba'i 'dug stangs ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung las g-yon pa brjid bag tu brkyang pa'o //
T02D2514:290b-1: mdun du bsnur ba ni de nyid la de bzhin du rgyab tu blta ba'o //
T02D2514:290b-2: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor drangs nas lte ba dang byang
T02D2514:290b-3: shar la sogs pa mtshams bzhir sngags dang phyag rgyas
T02D2514:290b-4: byin gyis brlabs pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bu sor
T02D2514:290b-5: brgyad pa dang rdo rje'i tho bas kyang de'i sngags
T02D2514:290b-6: brjod cing rim bzhin gdab par bya ste /
T02D2514:290b-7: de ni mtha' yas dang rnam nga rgyal ba la
T02D2514:290b-8: sogs pa zhes grags pa'i phur bus gnas ldar btab
T02D2514:290b-9: nas phyogs bcing zhing rab bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2514:290b-10: ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2514:290b-11: stang stabs la sogs pa la dang por rang gi
T02D2514:290b-12: ming nas smos ba sngon du 'gro bas yi ge
T02D2514:290b-13: h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par bya'o //
T02D2514:290b-14: 'di nyid 'khor lo thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o
T02D2514:290b-15: zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir sngags kyi cho ga
T02D2514:290b-16: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so
T02D2514:290b-17: // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2514:290b-18: sa'i lha mo ji lta ba bzhin du byung bar
T02D2514:290b-19: bsams la yid kyis spyan drangs nas mchod de dbus
T02D2514:290b-21: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D2514:290b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan gsum du bskul la gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2514:290b-23: de nas bdug spos dbul ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D2514:290b-24: thugs brtse phan pa'i dgongs pa can //
T02D2514:290b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2514:290b-26: chub sems dpa' rnams lhag par gnas par bya ste
T02D2514:290b-27: / dri la sogs pa rnams kyis byugs la lha
T02D2514:290b-28: thams cad kyi gnas su yi ge h'um dang bcas
T02D2514:290b-29: pa'i mtshan nas smos pa sngon du 'gro bas spos
T02D2514:290b-31: de nas spyod pas bskyod nas sgo bzhi'i go skabs
T02D2514:290b-32: nas byung ba'i yi ge h'um dang aa las dkyil
T02D2514:290b-33: 'khor pa'i lha'i 'khor lo phyung la gnas ji lta
T02D2514:290b-35: spyan drang ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i rim gyis
T02D2514:290b-36: sku byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa sngon du
T02D2514:290b-37: 'gro bas rang gi phyag rgya sngags dang bcas pas
T02D2514:290b-39: dbang bskur la mchod cing yang dag par bstod nas
T02D2514:290b-40: phyag byas la tshim par bya ba'i phyir sbyin sreg
T02D2514:290b-41: byas nas phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D2514:290b-42: de nas rtsa pa'i bum pa lhag par gnas pa
T02D2514:290b-43: ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas slob ma lhag
T02D2514:291a-1: 'khor gyi gnas su zhugs pa gshegs su gsol ba'i
T02D2514:291a-2: phyir sngar bshad pa bzhin du mchod pa la sogs
T02D2514:291a-3: pa byas la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ji lta
T02D2514:291a-4: ba bzhin du rdo rje'i lam nas snying ga'i rdo
T02D2514:291a-5: rje'i lte ba'i nang du gnas par bya'o //
T02D2514:291a-6: de nas phyi de nyin rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2514:291a-7: sbyor ba dang ldan pas mi bskyod pa la sogs
T02D2514:291a-8: pa'i snying pos phyung la sngon po la sogs pa'i
T02D2514:291a-9: tshon skud lnga de'i rang bzhin du byas te yi
T02D2514:291a-10: ge h'um 'don bzhin pas bsgril la de brgya rtsa
T02D2514:291a-12: de bzhin du tshon rnams la yang ci rigs par bya'o //
T02D2514:291a-13: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2514:291a-14: tshon dang thig la sangs rgyas lnga'i //
T02D2514:291a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:291a-16: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du thig gdab la
T02D2514:291a-17: dang por slob dpon gyis tshon rtsi dgye bar bya
T02D2514:291a-18: ste phyi nas slob mas bya'o //
T02D2514:291a-19: de yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor du sngon po dang dmar
T02D2514:291a-20: po dang dkar po dang ljang gu dang ser po'i
T02D2514:291a-21: tshon rnams kyis rab lnga bya'o //
T02D2514:291a-22: gnyis par ni sngon po dang /
T02D2514:291a-25: 'khor lo gsum pa la ni tshon rtsi dkar pos so //
T02D2514:291a-26: 'khor lo'i lte ba la ni seng ge'i gdan la
T02D2514:291a-27: gnas pa'i padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i
T02D2514:291a-28: rnam par snang mdzad dgod par bya'o //
T02D2514:291a-29: shar la sogs pa'i re'u'i cha rnams la ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2514:291a-30: 'khor lo'i byang shar la sogs par ni spyan la sogs pa'o //
T02D2514:291a-31: rim pa gnyis pa'i shar phyogs la sogs par ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D2514:291a-32: mtshams rnams su ni sku la byed ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D2514:291a-33: rim pa gsum pa'i shar la sogs pa'i sna ma bu la ni byams pa la sogs ba'o //
T02D2514:291b-0: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams @291b su gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
T02D2514:291b-1: mtshams rnams su mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2514:291b-2: dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ni go sla'o //
T02D2514:291b-3: de ltar dkyil 'khor mngon par bris nas ji lta
T02D2514:291b-4: ba bzhin du mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bum pa
T02D2514:291b-5: la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas te /
T02D2514:291b-6: rtsa ba'i bum pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2514:291b-7: sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas shing yi ge h'um brgya
T02D2514:291b-8: rtsa brgyad bzla ba dang lhag ma rnams kyi bum
T02D2514:291b-9: pa bzhi la ni spyan la sogs pa bzhi'i sngags
T02D2514:291b-10: bzla ba dang / lha thams cad kyi la ni rigs kyi dbye bas so //
T02D2514:291b-11: las thams cad pa bzlas pa sgor gzhag pa ni bsang gtor gyi bum pa bya'o //
T02D2514:291b-12: de nas lus khrus byas shing gos la sogs ba'i
T02D2514:291b-13: rgyan gyis brgyan la bdag po'i sbyor ba dang ldan
T02D2514:291b-14: pa'i rnal 'byor dam pas lha'i 'khor lo thams cad
T02D2514:291b-15: dang bdag nyid nang du bsgoms la /
T02D2514:291b-16: de'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas mchod yon dang mchod pa la yongs su bzlas te /
T02D2514:291b-17: sgo phye nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bum pa lags par bzhag la /
T02D2514:291b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams snga ma bzhin du phyung ste rang gnas su gnas par byas la /
T02D2514:291b-19: 'khor lo'i lha rnams rdo rje khro bo'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2514:291b-20: aom badzra aam ku sha a'a karsha ya h'um dza: zhes brjod la spyan drang ngo //
T02D2514:291b-21: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhi dang spyan la sogs pa'i rigs kyi yum rnams dang /
T02D2514:291b-22: sku la byed ma la sogs pa pho nya rnams ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so //
T02D2514:291b-23: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la sogs pa bran rnams ni zhags pa'i phyag rgyas so //
T02D2514:291b-24: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa khro bo rnams ni zhal gyi phyag rgyas so //
T02D2514:291b-25: h'um bam a'a: zhes brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas ni thams cad gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /
T02D2514:291b-27: de nas langs nas phur bu dang ra ba la
T02D2514:291b-28: sogs pas gnas srung ba byas la padma'i gdan dang
T02D2514:291b-29: / mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dag phul la sku
T02D2514:291b-30: la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya rnams
T02D2514:291b-31: kyis byin gyis brlabs te rang gi phyag rgya bstan
T02D2514:291b-32: / nas / rang gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur
T02D2514:291b-33: la ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bsams nas sgeg
T02D2514:291b-34: mo la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad dang sil
T02D2514:292a-1: la sogs pa yid dga' bar byed pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2514:292a-2: gyi mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad kyis yang dag
T02D2514:292a-3: par mchod nas thal mo sbyar te rol mo'i khyad
T02D2514:292a-4: par gzhan rnams kyis kyang mchod pa dang /
T02D2514:292a-5: lan gsum gyi bar du rdo rje'i glu blangs pas yang dag par bstod nas phyag byas te /
T02D2514:292a-6: lha rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa'i sbyin sreg phul la bzod par gsol te /
T02D2514:292a-7: de'i 'og tu dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba btab
T02D2514:292a-8: nas bdag nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa rdzogs par
T02D2514:292a-9: bya'o // de'i 'og tu slob ma khrus byas shing
T02D2514:292a-10: rgyan gyis brgyan la dzin dzi ka ces bya ba
T02D2514:292a-11: la sogs pa'i snying po dang /
T02D2514:292a-12: sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2514:292a-13: rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te mdzub mo dkri ba'i
T02D2514:292a-15: badzra ka wa tsa h'um zhes bya ba brjod cing
T02D2514:292a-16: gnas lngar go cha dang bcas par byas nas gdong
T02D2514:292a-17: gos kyis g-yogs te rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgyas
T02D2514:292a-18: me tog 'dzin bas h'um zhes bya ba nyid kyis
T02D2514:292a-19: gzhug cing thun mong gi cho ga thams cad byas
T02D2514:292a-20: nas / slob ma de'i thugs kar rdo rje sems
T02D2514:292a-21: dpas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad du
T02D2514:292a-23: dri dang me tog la sogs pas brgyan nas lha
T02D2514:292a-24: thams cad kyi bum pa la sogs pa ji lta
T02D2514:292a-25: ba bzhin du dbang bskur la rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2514:292a-27: 'di dag kyang ga las she na /
T02D2514:292a-28: dang por gyi sgra ni gtso bor bstan pa yin
T02D2514:292a-29: pa'i phyir te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lha'i bdud
T02D2514:292a-30: rtsis gang ba'i bum pa phyag na bsnams pa phyung
T02D2514:292a-31: nas de rnams kyis dbang bskur bar gyur par bsam
T02D2514:292a-32: mo // de nas yang gos la sogs pas brgyan
T02D2514:292a-33: nas rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i dbang bskur
T02D2514:292a-34: mo // te / sangs rgyas rnams rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyi gzugs su gyur par bsams nas /
T02D2514:292a-39: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la gser la sogs pa'i thur ma dang /
T02D2514:292a-40: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02D2514:292a-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas
T02D2514:292a-42: mi shes pa'i rab rib bsal la me long blangs
T02D2514:292b-0: te / rdo rje sems dpa'i rang @292b bzhin te //
T02D2514:292b-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02D2514:292b-2: yi ge aa dang glegs bam sbyin zhing aa dang
T02D2514:292b-3: dril bu sbyin la rjes su gnang ba sbyin par
T02D2514:292b-4: bya ba'i phyir 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi bar
T02D2514:292b-5: du bzhag nas lag pa g-yas par dung byin te
T02D2514:292b-6: / di ring phan chad 'jig rten du //
T02D2514:292b-7: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //
T02D2514:292b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do //
T02D2514:292b-10: de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis //
T02D2514:292b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dam tshig bstan nas /
T02D2514:292b-12: bla mas yon blangs te zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas
T02D2514:292b-13: nas mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa byas
T02D2514:292b-14: la h'um mu:/ zhes bya ba brjod de sems ma'i
T02D2514:292b-15: phyag rgya spyi bor dkrol te lha'i 'khor lo gshegs
T02D2514:292b-16: la h'um mu:/ su gsol lo // de nas phur
T02D2514:292b-17: bu phyung la gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du
T02D2514:292b-18: gshegs su gsol nas bya ba snga mas dza: h'um
T02D2514:292b-20: lhag ma rnams rang gi gnas su nang du bsgom mo //
T02D2514:292b-21: yi ge h'um gis tshon rtsi bsdu bar bya ste
T02D2514:292b-22: bsdus nas chu bo rnams su dor bar bya'o le'u
T02D2514:292b-25: // / gsang sngags kyi rim par phye ba bstan par
T02D2514:292b-26: bya ba'i phyir de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya
T02D2514:292b-27: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:292b-28: ji lta ba bzhin du phyung la so so'i gsang
T02D2514:292b-29: sngags kyi yi ges gnas ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2514:292b-30: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dgod par bya'o zhes gsungs
T02D2514:292b-31: pa ste gsang sngags kyi yi ge 'di dag gis
T02D2514:292b-33: de dag la brten nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2514:292b-34: pas ni gsang sngags kyi che ba'i bdag nyid ston
T02D2514:292b-35: pa yin no // le'u gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D2514:292b-37: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la
T02D2514:292b-38: sogs pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan
T02D2514:292b-39: pa yin te / ye shes chen po nyid stobs yin la /
T02D2514:292b-40: de'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2514:292b-41: la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid do
T02D2514:292b-42: // de nyid mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste
T02D2514:292b-43: ting nge 'dzin gang la de skad ces bya ba
T02D2514:292b-44: de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02D2514:292b-45: yi ge aom nyid ye shes te thugs yin la
T02D2514:292b-46: de las ji lta ba bzhin du sprul to zhes
T02D2514:292b-48: shes rab ye shes rab rgyas pa //
T02D2514:293a-1: shes rab dang ye shes kyis rab tu rgyas pas
T02D2514:293a-2: sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid du bskyed pa'i sangs
T02D2514:293a-3: rgyas kun mchog ni rin po che'i dbu rgyan te
T02D2514:293a-4: nges mchod pa ni brgyan pa'o //
T02D2514:293a-5: zhal gsum zhes bya ba la dbus ma ni gser gyi mdog can no //
T02D2514:293a-7: g-yon ni dkar po ste de rnams kyis rnam par mdzes pa'o //
T02D2514:293a-8: bsam gtan phyag rgya can zhes bya ba ni rdo
T02D2514:293a-9: rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'i pang bar phyag
T02D2514:293a-10: g-yon pa brkyang la de'i steng du phyag g-yas pa
T02D2514:293a-12: bgrang phreng ldan zhing zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis na bgrang phreng dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2514:293a-13: mda' yis brgyan ces bya ba ni g-yas kyi gsum pa mda' dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2514:293a-14: nu ma 'dzin ces bya ba ni phyag g-yon pa'i gnyis pa lha mo'i nu ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2514:293a-15: rdo rje gzhu thogs shing zhes bya ba ni gsum pa rdo rje gzhu bsnams shing /
T02D2514:293a-16: 'og tu ni kun du drag po dang khyab 'jug
T02D2514:293a-17: la sogs pa'i lha rnams bred cing skrag par bri'o
T02D2514:293a-18: // de nyid spyod yul bsgom par gyis //
T02D2514:293a-19: zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston pa yin te
T02D2514:293a-20: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub pa pos yid la
T02D2514:293a-21: rang gi sngags bzlas shing snyoms par 'jug pa las
T02D2514:293a-22: byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprin rang gi
T02D2514:293a-23: rigs pa dang sbyor ba spro ba dang bsdu ba
T02D2514:293a-24: la sogs pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2514:293a-25: a'a zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam //
T02D2514:293a-26: zhes bya ba ni aa las byung ba 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D2514:293a-28: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi skur yongs su byung ba'o //
T02D2514:293a-29: dbu rgyan thams cad mkhyen pas brgyan //
T02D2514:293a-30: zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa dbu la 'jog pa'o //
T02D2514:293a-31: zhal gsum 'bar ba la zhes bya ba ni dang po ni dkar po /
T02D2514:293a-32: g-yon pa ni gser mdog go //
T02D2514:293a-33: g-yas pa ni autpala'i mdog can no //
T02D2514:293a-34: de rnams kyis 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D2514:293a-35: lha mo bzhi dang gdan gcig pas na 'dug stangs bzhi pa can no //
T02D2514:293a-36: padma'i 'jo tshul ldan zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa
T02D2514:293a-37: dkur brten pas sdong bu 'dzin cing g-yas pa thugs
T02D2514:293a-38: kar 'byed pa'o // bgrang phreng rdo rje 'chang zhes
T02D2514:293b-0: bya ba g-yas @293b kyi gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang
T02D2514:293b-2: nu ma 'dzin zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2514:293b-3: gsum pas ni spyi blugs bsnams pa'o //
T02D2514:293b-4: gzugs rnams thams cad ces bya ba ni lta ba
T02D2514:293b-5: la spyod pa'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i
T02D2514:293b-6: phyir lha thams cad kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'o//
T02D2514:293b-7: zla ba'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2514:293b-8: sems kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2514:293b-9: mthing shun bzang po lta bu'i mdog / ces bya ba ni mthing shun gyi mdog can no //
T02D2514:293b-10: mi 'khrugs bzhugs zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D2514:293b-11: zhal gsum zhes bya ba la zhal dbus ma ni sngon po'o //
T02D2514:293b-14: rin chen 'byung ldan ni dbus ma dang g-yas g-yon
T02D2514:293b-15: dag dmar po dang sngon po dang dkar po'i zhal
T02D2514:293b-16: mnga' bas na zhal gsum pa'o //
T02D2514:293b-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2514:293b-18: g-yas na ni rdo rje bsnams pa g-yon pas ni
T02D2514:293b-19: rin po che bsnams pa ste phyag bzhi par bsgom
T02D2514:293b-20: par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D2514:293b-21: don yod grub pa'i rdo rje ni phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02D2514:293b-22: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan zhing /
T02D2514:293b-23: ral gri dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02D2514:293b-24: yi ge kham las byung ba sngo bsangs kyi mdog can no //
T02D2514:293b-25: spyan ni rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba'i zhal gsum mnga' ba dang /
T02D2514:293b-26: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can //
T02D2514:293b-27: zhes bya ba ste phyag g-yon pas zhags pa thogs pa dang sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
T02D2514:293b-28: byang chub yan lag stobs brgyan pa'i //
T02D2514:293b-29: zhes bya ba ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed
T02D2514:293b-30: pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
T02D2514:293b-31: dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la sogs pa stobs bcus brgyan pa'o //
T02D2514:293b-32: m'a ma k'i'i zhal gsum ni mi bskyod pa dang 'dra'o //
T02D2514:293b-33: dngos dang dngos med mtshan nyed can //
T02D2514:293b-34: zhes bya ba ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2514:293b-36: zhes bya ba ni 'di lta bu'i bsam pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2514:293b-37: gos dkar can gyi zhal ras gsum //
T02D2514:293b-38: zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2514:293b-39: sgrol ma'i zhal gsum ni don yod rdo rje dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2514:294a-1: yang gsor zhes bya ba ni mdas gar byed pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2514:294a-2: rdo rje sems la sogs pa bzhi ni rim bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2514:294a-5: las kyi sems dpa' dang 'dra bar nye bar bstan
T02D2514:294a-6: par bya ba'i phyir skyes mchog ces bya ba la
T02D2514:294a-7: sogs pa gsungs te de rnams ni zhal gsum pa'o
T02D2514:294a-9: yi ge dgu yi thabs dgu can //

T02D2514:303b-9: glu len cing rdo rje'i pi wang brdung ba'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje glu ma'i'o //
T02D2514:303b-10: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gar byed pa'i tshul du bskor ba ni rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i'o //
T02D2514:303b-11: gsang ba dang phyi'i mchod pa gar sngon du 'gro bas bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2514:303b-12: 'jo sgeg thabs la spro ba yis /
T02D2514:303b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2514:303b-14: me tog ni thal mo dang gar gyis me tog
T02D2514:303b-15: dbul ba'i tshul du byed pa ni me tog ma'i'o
T02D2514:303b-16: // phan tshun rgyab sbyar la gung mo bsgreng nas
T02D2514:303b-17: spos kyi tshul du bskor ba ni bdug spos ma'i'o
T02D2514:303b-18: // // mthe bo gnyis mar me'i tshul du gzhag pa ni mar me ma'i'o //
T02D2514:303b-19: gar sngon du 'gro bas byug pa'i tshul du byed pa ni byug pa ma'i'o //
T02D2514:303b-20: lag pa gnyis dung gi tshul du sbyar la mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2514:303b-21: lag pa gnyis kyis brdebs pas rdza rda brdung ba'i tshul du bya ba dang /
T02D2514:303b-22: rang gi bud pa'i tshul gyis gling bu 'bud pa dang /
T02D2514:303b-23: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la mthe bo gnyis gshibs la brkyang /
T02D2514:303b-24: mthe bo gnyis gdu bur byas pa'i dung 'bud pa dang lag pa g-yas pa bteg ste /
T02D2514:303b-25: de nyid kyis rnga yab g-yob ba ltar bya ba
T02D2514:303b-26: dang lag pa g-yon pa bteg la lag pa g-yas
T02D2514:303b-27: pa rgyal mtshan gyi tshul du dbyangs pa dang /
T02D2514:303b-28: de bzhin du gnyi ga ba dan du bya ba'i
T02D2514:303b-29: don du g-yo zhing bskor bas 'og tu bya ba
T02D2514:303b-30: dang tshon 'gyed pa'i tshul gyis phreng ba bya ba
T02D2514:303b-31: dang lag pa g-yon pa pang bar gzhag ste snod
T02D2514:303b-32: du byas la / g-yas pa bzung nas lha bshos rnam pa sna tshogs pa dbul ba dang /
T02D2514:303b-33: zur bzhi'i tshul gyis khang pa brtsegs ma bya ba dang /
T02D2514:303b-34: gos kyi tshul te na bza' 'dra ba'i tshul dang /

T02D2514:304a-1: gnas ji lta bar brgyan par bya ba dang /
T02D2514:304a-2: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bo'i rtse mo'i steng du g-yas pa brkyang la gdugs su bya ba dang /
T02D2514:304a-3: lag pa g-yon pa thad kar brkyang la g-yas pa
T02D2514:304a-4: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i steng du gzhag ste nam
T02D2514:304a-5: mkha' la bskor na bla rer 'gyur ro //
T02D2514:304a-6: mtshams rnams su drang ba la sogs pa bya ste
T02D2514:304a-7: 'di dag la yi ge h'um gis ci rigs par
T02D2514:304a-8: bya'o // de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'i don
T02D2514:304a-9: du shes rab kyi sgo 'phar dbye bar bya ba'i
T02D2514:304a-11: gang rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba de rnams
T02D2514:304a-12: kyi byang chub kyi sems rnam par bsgoms pas thams
T02D2514:304a-13: cad rdo rje'i 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid du shin tu
T02D2514:304a-14: dad pa ni lha thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D2514:304a-15: dang thugs rnams la mchod pa bla na med pa
T02D2514:304a-17: dbu ma'i theg pa bsgoms pas rnam par ma bsgoms
T02D2514:304a-18: pa yang kun rdzob kyi mchod pa yin par blta
T02D2514:304a-19: bar bya'o // dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyi sku
T02D2514:304a-20: dang gsung dang thugs dang de bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu
T02D2514:304a-21: mnyam pa med pas legs so zhes gsungs so //
T02D2514:304a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rigs ldan ni
T02D2514:304a-23: skye ba dang 'gag pa dang bral bas bcom ldan

T02D2514:304a-26: sku gsum gyi bde ba'i sgo nas lha thams cad la bstod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2514:304a-27: bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yi //
T02D2514:304a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:304a-29: rdo rje ye shes ni byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D2514:304a-30: bdag nyid can te de las zla ba dang rdo
T02D2514:304a-31: rje la sogs pa'i rim gyis bde ba'i ngo bor
T02D2514:304a-32: 'khrungs pa'o // ji lta bu zhe na dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:304a-33: dngos po rnam par bsgom pa ni rnam par snang
T02D2514:304a-34: mdzad la sogs pa bdag po bskyed pa'i sgo yod
T02D2514:304a-35: pa de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2514:304a-36: gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te gang gi phyir dang por te /
T02D2514:304a-37: thog mar rnam par snang mdzad ni //
T02D2514:304a-38: aom las byung bar sprul pa'o //
T02D2514:304a-39: gang gis she na dag cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:304a-40: dag cing rnam dag ces bya ba ni nyon mongs
T02D2514:304b-0: pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa las @304b dben zhing
T02D2514:304b-1: / sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa yin pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2514:304b-2: gzungs mang tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni yang dag
T02D2514:304b-3: pa'i rig pa bcu mtshan nyid can gyi phreng bas
T02D2514:304b-4: bcings pa ni bskyed pa ste /
T02D2514:304b-5: kun nas nyon mongs pa zil gyis gnon pa'i bdag nyid can gyi bstod pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2514:304b-6: de pas na sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi ngo
T02D2514:304b-7: bo bcom ldan 'das de nyid la phyag 'tshal ba'o
T02D2514:304b-8: // gsung snyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2514:304b-9: yi ge kun ni padma'i regs kyi lha mo rnams
T02D2514:304b-10: kyis te de kun du bsten cing khyab pa'i bar
T02D2514:304b-11: gyis gsungs snyan ces gsungs so //
T02D2514:304b-12: gsung ni yi ge a'a: ste /
T02D2514:304b-13: de nyid skye ba med pa ston pas spros pa med par ston pa'o //
T02D2514:304b-14: de la 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs pa ni de las byung pa'i phyir te /
T02D2514:304b-15: snga ma bzhin du de la yang bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2514:304b-16: des byas pa'i mig gsum pa lha mo dang bcas
T02D2514:304b-17: pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i skus btul bar mdzad pa
T02D2514:304b-18: dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang tshul mang ba dang
T02D2514:304b-19: ldan pa gang yin pa de lta bu gzhan 'ga'
T02D2514:304b-20: yang mnyam pa med pa dang bde ba chen po'i
T02D2514:304b-21: rang bzhin gyi rjes su chags pas bzhugs pa ste
T02D2514:304b-22: dang / / na chung dag dang lhan cig bzhad
T02D2514:304b-23: cing rol ba ni bden pa ma yin pas kun
T02D2514:304b-24: rdzob tu bzhugs par ston pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2514:304b-25: da ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te yi ge
T02D2514:304b-26: gsum gyi rnam pa las rim gyis 'bras bu'i sgo
T02D2514:304b-27: nas bdag nyid chen po'i 'byung ba sngon du 'gro
T02D2514:304b-28: bas phyag 'tshal ba ston pa yin te de la
T02D2514:304b-30: 'di'i yang phyag g-yas pas thugs kar rdo rje bstod de 'jog la /
T02D2514:304b-31: g-yon pa dkur brten nas dril bu 'khrol bar mdzad cing /
T02D2514:304b-32: yang g-yas dang g-yon gyis mda' dang gzhu gsor zhing bsnams pa /
T02D2514:304b-33: zla ba'i mdog can la cung zad dmar bas mdzes
T02D2514:304b-34: pa'i mdangs can lha mo bzhi'i btsun mos bskor ba
T02D2514:304b-35: ste / de yang gcig ni lha mo k'i li
T02D2514:304b-36: k'i la ste mchog tu dbus kyi rang gi lha'i
T02D2514:304b-38: gnyis pa ni chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan can te
T02D2514:304b-39: rgyab tu gnas shing rjes su chags pa bde ba
T02D2514:304b-40: chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2514:304b-41: gsum ba ni bsnyems ma zhes bya ba ste me
T02D2514:304b-42: tog gi phreng bas bdag po la kun nas 'phen
T02D2514:305a-2: bzhi pa ni me tog gi mig can te /
T02D2514:305a-3: g-yas nas bde ba'i mda' 'phen pa ste 'dod pa'i mda' zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2514:305a-4: gang zhig glu 'di len cing stod par byed pa dang /
T02D2514:305a-5: sgom par byed pa des ni bde ba'i rdo rje can dang mnyam pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2514:305a-6: de rnams kyis phyi'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D2514:305a-7: dang yid kyi mchod pa rnams aom aa nutta ra
T02D2514:305a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pas byin gyis brlab par
T02D2514:305a-9: bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2514:305a-12: // / da ni byang chub kyi sems bstan par bya ba'i don du /
T02D2514:305a-13: rgyud phyi ma bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2514:305a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:305a-15: sems ni lus kyi rnam pa yin la zhes bya
T02D2514:305a-16: ba ni de lta bu'i rnam par snang ba yin
T02D2514:305a-17: te / de skad du khams gsum po 'di dag ni sems tsam mo zhes gang gsungs pas so //
T02D2514:305a-18: chos rnams zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams la'o //
T02D2514:305a-19: skye ba med pas brjod du med pa ni yi ge med pa'o //
T02D2514:305a-20: yi ge med pas na gnas pa med pa'o //
T02D2514:305a-21: de bas na de kho na nyid du med pa'o //
T02D2514:305a-22: rtog pa dang brjod pa thams cad kyi gnas ma
T02D2514:305a-23: yin pas na rtog pa dang brjod pa'i tshul spangs
T02D2514:305a-24: pa'o // gsung gi spros ba tsam nyid rdo rje
T02D2514:305a-25: yin pas na de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2514:305a-26: de la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2514:305a-27: dngos po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs rnams so //
T02D2514:305a-28: de ma bskyed pa yin te /
T02D2514:305a-29: de bas na chos can dang chos nyid dang bral bas chos thams cad med pa ste /
T02D2514:305a-30: yang dag par rig pa bcu'i mtshan nyid can dang
T02D2514:305a-31: chos nyid med pa ste yid du 'ong ba'i don
T02D2514:305a-32: thob pa'i bdag nyid can med pa'o //
T02D2514:305a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmigs su med
T02D2514:305a-34: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la de
T02D2514:305a-35: skad ces bya'o // dngos po 'di dag ces bya
T02D2514:305a-36: ba ni rin po che'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams
T02D2514:305a-37: skad ces bya'o // so // chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin //
T02D2514:305a-38: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i chos
T02D2514:305a-39: rnams ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir
T02D2514:305a-40: ro // ji ltar na 'di ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2514:305a-41: bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i //
T02D2514:305a-42: zhes bya ba gsungs te mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
T02D2514:305b-0: shes kyi @305b bdag po las skyes zhes bya ba'i
T02D2514:305b-1: don to // me lce 'bar ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o //
T02D2514:305b-2: de nyid rdo rje 'bar ba ste de la dmigs
T02D2514:305b-3: pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la yang de skad ces
T02D2514:305b-4: bya'o // dngos po zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D2514:305b-5: de ni skye ba med pa yin la de bas na dngos po med pa ste /
T02D2514:305b-6: lha rnams dang sgom du med pa ste bsgom par bya ba'ang med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2514:305b-7: dngos po zhes rab tu brjod pa ni kun rdzob yin no //
T02D2514:305b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D2514:305b-9: de nyid rdo rje ste de la dmigs pa'i ting
T02D2514:305b-10: nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la yang de skad
T02D2514:305b-11: ces bya'o // chos rnams zhes bya ba ni las kyi rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D2514:305b-12: gzod nas dag pa ni thog ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2514:305b-13: rnyog pa med pa ni nyes pa thams cad las dpen pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2514:305b-14: de bas na sems can med pa ste bla ba'i
T02D2514:305b-15: dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo dang srog kyang me dang
T02D2514:305b-16: ste phyag mtshan gyi gzugs med pa dang sangs rgyas
T02D2514:305b-17: nyid med pa ste rigs kyi bdag po'i mtshan nyid
T02D2514:305b-18: can dang / byang chub med pa ste bya ba
T02D2514:305b-19: sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can dngos po
T02D2514:305b-20: can dang / med pa'o // sangs rgyas dang dag pa dang /
T02D2514:305b-21: chos bstan pa rnams ni sku dang thugs dang gsung gi sgo nas so //
T02D2514:305b-22: chos thams cad bdag med pa bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas na /
T02D2514:305b-23: bdag med chos las legs byung ste //
T02D2514:305b-24: 'di dag ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i rgyud dang 'bras bur gyur pa yin no //
T02D2514:305b-25: byang chub ces bya ba la sogs ba ni phyag 'tshal ba ston pa yin te /
T02D2514:305b-26: ji ltar 'byung zhe na byang chub tshogs kyis bsgoms pa yis //
T02D2514:305b-27: zhes bya ba ste byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa'i
T02D2514:305b-28: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bla na med
T02D2514:305b-29: pa'i bsod rnams dang ye shes kyi tshogs des rgyud
T02D2514:305b-31: mi g-yo yi ge las 'byung zhing //
T02D2514:305b-32: zhes bya ba ni zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2514:305b-33: de ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /

T02D2514:306a-0: // thugs rdo rje'i sbyor bas dang por bzlas @306a * //
T02D2514:306a-1: pa la sogs pa la rang gi lha spyan drang
T02D2514:306a-2: ba la sogs pa bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2514:306a-3: phyir / gnas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te 'di dag ga las shes she na /
T02D2514:306a-4: 'khor los sgyur ba chen por gyur pas chos kyi
T02D2514:306a-5: mthar yang dam tshig rdo rje can du gyur nas
T02D2514:306a-6: rang gi lha spyan drang bar bya'o zhes bstan par
T02D2514:306a-8: rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis brtag / ces bya ba ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02D2514:306a-9: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang ldan par 'dug la
T02D2514:306a-10: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos nyid mngon du byas
T02D2514:306a-11: te / rang gi phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D2514:306a-12: rdo rje sems mas byin gyis brlabs la h'um zhes bya ba brjod de /
T02D2514:306a-13: rang gi lus kyi rin po che la bdag nyid
T02D2514:306a-14: rdo rje can yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed la
T02D2514:306a-15: ji skad du bshad pa'i gnas dang stan la sogs
T02D2514:306a-16: pa rdzogs nas / rdo rje'i lcags kyus rang gi
T02D2514:306a-17: lha spyan drangs la gdan ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2514:306a-18: pa rdzogs nas / bstabs te / rigs kyi yum
T02D2514:306a-19: gyi dam tshig nye bar bstan nas phyag rgya bskor
T02D2514:306a-20: bas phyogs bcings la mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la
T02D2514:306a-21: sogs pa phul nas go cha bskon te /
T02D2514:306a-22: phyogs su mda' 'phen pa'i tshul dang /
T02D2514:306a-23: phur bu dang rabs srung ba byas la /
T02D2514:306a-24: rang gi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur
T02D2514:306a-25: te gsang ba'i mchod pa dang rol mo la sogs
T02D2514:306a-26: pa bsam zhing bstod pa dang /
T02D2514:306a-27: phyag bya la sogs pa'i rim gyis rang gi lha'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2514:306a-28: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor la ni rang gi
T02D2514:306a-29: sngags dang phyag rgyas bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la
T02D2514:306a-30: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal du bya'o //
T02D2514:306a-31: yongs su rtog pa'i rnal 'byor ni byang chub kyi
T02D2514:306a-32: sems bsgom pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rang gi
T02D2514:306a-33: lhar bskyed pa'o // yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni /
T02D2514:306a-34: skad cig gis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
T02D2514:306a-35: ldan pa'i rang gi lha'i gzugs su spro ba dang
T02D2514:306a-36: / sdud par byad bas bsgom pa'o //
T02D2514:306a-37: dam tshig byin gyis brlab pa ni ltar byin gyis brlab pa yin te sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D2514:306a-38: rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan
T02D2514:306a-39: 'das lha thams cad kyi rnal 'byor gyis byung ba
T02D2514:306b-0: de nyid brtags pa ste @306b sems so sor rtogs

T02D2514:306b-4: ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge

T02D2514:306b-6: // // yongs su brtag pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor gnyis bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

T02D2514:306b-15: de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyung ste /

T02D2514:306b-17: du chud pa sngon du 'gro bas de las byung

T02D2514:306b-22: rang dang spyan gnyis byung ba'i rgyal mtshan la gnas
T02D2514:306b-23: pa'i yi ge thams cad ra sa'i sems zhu bar
T02D2514:306b-24: byas la byang chub kyi sems phyung ste h'um las
T02D2514:306b-25: byung ba'i rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje byas la
T02D2514:306b-26: de nas sngags kyi yi ge gnyis yi ge ho
T02D2514:306b-27: dmar po dang spel ba rang gi khar bcug ste
T02D2514:306b-28: / 'dod chags chen po'i mes de zhu bar gyur cing /
T02D2514:306b-29: gnyi ga yang zhu bar gyur par bltas la spyan
T02D2514:306b-30: la sogs pas bslang ba'i glu dang yang dag par
T02D2514:306b-31: bskul ba sngon du 'gro bar byas pa dang /

T02D2514:306b-33: ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang gi gsang sngags
T02D2514:306b-34: dang ldan pas rdo rje'i bdag nyid ni bdag yin
T02D2514:306b-35: no zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bskyed nas /

T02D2514:306b-37: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dam pas brgyan pa dang phyag
T02D2514:306b-38: rgya dang nye bar ldan pa'i ye shes sems dpar
T02D2514:306b-40: cha shes kyi ni dra ba can //
T02D2514:307a-0: zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa spyan la sogs par @307a * //
T02D2514:307a-1: rang gi sa bon las byung ba dgod par bya'o //
T02D2514:307a-2: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa
T02D2514:307a-3: rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang sa'i
T02D2514:307a-4: snying po la sogs pa bkod la /
T02D2514:307a-5: yang yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te rdo
T02D2514:307a-6: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang gi sngags dang
T02D2514:307a-7: phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2514:307a-8: de nas go cha dang mtshon cha la sogs pa
T02D2514:307a-9: brtag par bya zhing rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga po
T02D2514:307a-10: rin po che'i dbu rgyan du gyur pa'i cod pan
T02D2514:307a-11: dang / phreng ba rnams kyis dbang bskur la /
T02D2514:307a-12: gsang ba'i mchod ba rnams kyis mchod de /
T02D2514:307a-13: de'i 'og tu sgyu ma ste rang gi lha'i gzugs
T02D2514:307a-14: kyi mtshan nyid can sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa mdzad
T02D2514:307a-15: pa de rnams kyis sems can thams cad 'dul zhing
T02D2514:307a-16: / padma la gnas pa rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'phro
T02D2514:307a-17: ba'i bdag nyid can gyi lus dang ldan pa spros
T02D2514:307a-18: / nas / yang dag par bsdus te rang gi
T02D2514:307a-19: gdan la gnas par bya ste rang gi lha'i nga
T02D2514:307a-20: / nas / rgyal bya'o // 'dir yang rdo rje
T02D2514:307a-21: sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor gsum
T02D2514:307a-22: char yang ston pa ni sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan dag
T02D2514:307a-23: nye bar mtshon pa'i don du 'di dag bstan pa
T02D2514:307a-24: yin te gzhan du na de rnams kyi mos pa'i
T02D2514:307a-25: dbang gis nye bar dgod pa don med par thal
T02D2514:307a-27: dban bskur ba byas pas ni sgeg mo la sogs
T02D2514:307a-28: pa yang dag par mchod la stong pa nyid du
T02D2514:307a-30: byas te / rdo rje glu la sogs pa rnams
T02D2514:307a-31: kyis bdag nyid kyi lus bskyed do //
T02D2514:307a-32: la la ni yongs su brtags pa dang gzhan gyi
T02D2514:307a-33: dbang la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dbye
T02D2514:307a-34: ba dang rang gi lha nyid kyi sbyor ba nyid
T02D2514:307a-35: kyis sems can gyi bsam pa'i nga rgyal gyi dbye
T02D2514:307a-36: bas byang chub gsum 'dir gsungs pa yin la /
T02D2514:307a-37: de ni dang po phye ste spros pa yin la gzhan dag ni ma bshad do //
T02D2514:307a-38: bsgom pas skyo bar gyur na myur ches pa dang
T02D2514:307a-39: dbul ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i gsang sngags
T02D2514:307a-40: bzlas brjod bya'o // bzlas pas skyo na g-yas pas
T02D2514:307a-41: rdo rje gsor la g-yon pa dkur brten pa'i dril
T02D2514:307a-42: bu gsil zhing rdo rje'i glu blangs la mchod pa
T02D2514:307a-43: bzlas brjod bya'o // byas te / snga ma bzhin du gshegs su gsol la bdag nyid bsrungs te /
T02D2514:307b-0: @307b sku dang gsung dang thugs bsgom ba ci bde ba la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2514:307b-1: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bar chad du gyur pas
T02D2514:307b-2: kyang yi ge brgya ba brjod pa nye bar bsdu
T02D2514:307b-3: bar bya'o // le'u bdun ba'i bshad pa'o /
T02D2514:307b-5: // / las kyi tshogs bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2514:307b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:307b-7: lha ni gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:307b-9: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gang gzhag par gyur pa'i
T02D2514:307b-10: dkyil 'khor te de'i ming 'byung ba zhes bya bar
T02D2514:307b-11: 'gyur ro // bdag po nyid kyis zhes bya ba
T02D2514:307b-12: ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2514:307b-13: gyis zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya ba'o
T02D2514:307b-14: 'gyur ro // // 'khor lo'i rgyal mo rnams bsgoms nas //
T02D2514:307b-15: zhes bya ba ni spyan la sogs pa'i rgyal mo
T02D2514:307b-16: bsgoms pas te zhi ba'i las ni skul byed ma
T02D2514:307b-18: rgyas pa la ni rin chen sgrol ma dang gos dkar mo gnyis kyis so //
T02D2514:307b-19: dbang la ni sgrol ma dang /
T02D2514:307b-20: rdo rje lu gu rgyud gnyis kyis so //
T02D2514:307b-21: yams la sogs pa rnam par gzhig pa la ni
T02D2514:307b-22: 'od zer can dang ri khrod kyi lo ma can
T02D2514:307b-23: gyis so // mngon spyod la ni m'a ma k'i dang khro gnyer can gyis so //
T02D2514:307b-24: rol pa ste zhes bya ba ni don dam pa la rol pa'i dang tshul dang ldan pas so //
T02D2514:307b-25: chags pa'i rdo rje rjes chags pa //
T02D2514:307b-26: zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa la rjes su chags pa'o //
T02D2514:307b-27: gsang sngags de nyid kyis bskul na //
T02D2514:307b-28: zhes bya ba ni sbyor bas so //
T02D2514:307b-29: dang po ni ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas /
T02D2514:307b-30: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du sprul par
T02D2514:307b-31: bsams te rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor bas bskul
T02D2514:307b-32: ba dang bcas pa de'i sngags brjod las spyan nam
T02D2514:307b-34: byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i zla
T02D2514:307b-35: ba ltar dkar ba'i bum pa lag pa gnyis kyis
T02D2514:307b-36: 'dzin cing bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs bsnams
T02D2514:307b-37: la / dbang po zhi zhing zla ba ltar dkar
T02D2514:307b-38: ba spros la nad la sogs pas gdungs pa'i 'jig
T02D2514:307b-39: rten la ldugs par bsam mo zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D2514:307b-40: la / du'o // dang po ting nge 'dzin gyis sbrul nas //
T02D2514:307b-41: zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D2514:308a-0: lus la sogs pa rgyas par bya ba la ni @308a * //
T02D2514:308a-1: rin chen tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas
T02D2514:308a-2: rin chen sgrol ma dang gos dkar mo gser gyi
T02D2514:308a-3: mdog can la bdud rtsi la sogs pas yongs su
T02D2514:308a-4: gang ba'i gser gyi bum pa phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin
T02D2514:308a-5: cing padma dang rin po che bsnams pa bdud rtsi'am
T02D2514:308a-6: rin po che'i char 'bebs pas bsgrub par bya ba'am
T02D2514:308a-7: / de'i khyim 'gengs par de bzhin du bsgom mo //
T02D2514:308a-8: bkug ste mda' yis bsnun na ni //
T02D2514:308a-9: zhes bya ba 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02D2514:308a-10: 'od dpag med kyi rnal 'byor pas sgrol ma'am lu
T02D2514:308a-11: gu rgyud mdog dmar zhing 'od zer dmar po dang
T02D2514:308a-12: ldan pa zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin la /
T02D2514:308a-13: g-yon gyis gzhu bzung nas g-yas kyis rtse dmar ba'i
T02D2514:308a-14: mda' 'dren pas bsgrub par bya ba'i snying ga'i lte
T02D2514:308a-15: ba la bsnun par snga ma bzhin du bsams na
T02D2514:308a-16: nges par mdag gzhug nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2514:308a-17: don yod rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas ni 'od zer can nam /
T02D2514:308a-18: ri khrod kyi lo ma can mdog ljang gu byang
T02D2514:308a-19: chub kyi sems kyi chus gang ba'i bum pa phyag
T02D2514:308a-20: na thogs nas yul 'khor du snga ma bzhin du
T02D2514:308a-21: ldugs par bsams na bdud la sogs pa'i nye bar
T02D2514:308a-22: 'tshe ba sel bar 'gyur bas na yams dang gnod
T02D2514:308a-23: pa zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D2514:308a-24: margad lta bu'i mdog can la //
T02D2514:308a-25: zhes bya ba ni ba rgad ki 'od kyi mdog can no //
T02D2514:308a-26: h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2514:308a-27: zhes bya ba ni khro ga nyer can nam m'a ma k'is h'um gi nga ro'i sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02D2514:308a-28: rdo rje bsdigs par brtson pa yis //
T02D2514:308a-29: zhes bya ba ni snying gar khro bo'i sdigs mdzub kyis bsgrub bya la bsdigs par brtson pa'o //
T02D2514:308a-30: khros nas ni zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i lta
T02D2514:308a-31: bas rdo rje me'i char 'bebs par mi bskyod pa'i
T02D2514:308a-32: rnal 'byor dang ldan pas snga ma bzhin du bsam
T02D2514:308a-33: par bya zhing bsgrub par bya ba 'jigs par 'gyur
T02D2514:308a-35: sbyor bzhes bya ba ni phyag rgya la sogs pa'i sbyor bas so //
T02D2514:308a-36: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhis rang gi
T02D2514:308a-37: rigs dang ldan pa rnams byin gyis brlab cing spyan
T02D2514:308a-38: drangs la dam tshig la bzhag nas /
T02D2514:308a-40: skal ba bzang po pa rnams kyang zhi ba dang
T02D2514:308b-0: rgyas pa la sogs @308b pa'i las la sbyar na
T02D2514:308b-1: des rang gi las zhi ba dang rgyas pa la
T02D2514:308b-2: sogs pa'i 'bras bu don yod par sbyin par byed
T02D2514:308b-3: par 'gyur ro // khro bo'i rgyal por sbyar bar bya //
T02D2514:308b-4: zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i
T02D2514:308b-5: rnal 'byor pas las de nyid la sbyar bar bya'o
T02D2514:308b-7: dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2514:308b-8: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis bskul ba sngon du
T02D2514:308b-9: 'gro ba dang / gsang sngags brjod la dam tshig spyan drang ba dang bskrad pa dang /
T02D2514:308b-10: bsrung ba dang mngon spyod la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2514:308b-11: mngon spyod nyid bstan bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2514:308b-12: rkang rjes sa'i zhes bya ba la sogs ba gsungs te /
T02D2514:308b-13: dgra bo'i tsha ba ba skyed par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2514:308b-14: ji skad du bstan pa bzhin de'i gzugs brnyan byas
T02D2514:308b-15: la / rnam par shes pa dgug pa la sogs
T02D2514:308b-16: pa sngon du 'gro bas dug dang ske tshe la
T02D2514:308b-17: sogs pas bkang nas shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur
T02D2514:308b-18: la / pa la / bo son cha'i tsher mas khro bo'i sngags bzlas pas dbug go //
T02D2514:308b-19: gsad pa la ni mi rus kyi phur bus dpral ba la sogs pa gnas lngar gdab bo //
T02D2514:308b-20: de yang 'di ltar phur bus btab nas bskam par bya ste /
T02D2514:308b-21: de bzhin du des kyang ma nus na dum bur gtubs nas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2514:308b-22: rus sbal gyi rkang pas ni sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D2514:308b-23: cho ga bzhin du dgug par bya //
T02D2514:308b-24: zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um gis srung ba drangs la dpal dang bral bar bya'o //
T02D2514:308b-25: bsgrub bya bsams nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D2514:308b-26: khro bo la las zhags pas bcings nas lho phyogs
T02D2514:308b-27: su khrid par gyur pa dang /
T02D2514:308b-28: la las rdo rjes brdegs bzhin pa dang /
T02D2514:308b-29: la las ral gris gtubs bar gyur pa dang /
T02D2514:308b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bskul tshig sngon du
T02D2514:308b-32: 'gro bas rdo rje srin pos bsgrub par bya ba
T02D2514:308b-34: bya rog dang khyi la sogs pas kun nas bskor nas za zhing 'thog par bsams so //
T02D2514:308b-35: ming nas bskul bar bya zhes bya ba ni de'i ming nas bskul bas so //
T02D2514:308b-36: bskrad pa'i yang nang gi sbyor ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2514:308b-37: rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2514:308b-38: gsungs te rlung gi dkyil 'khor la zhon pa h'um
T02D2514:308b-39: dang spel ba'i au las byung ba'i rdo rje rnga
T02D2514:309a-1: rgyab tu bsgrub par bya ba zhon par yongs su
T02D2514:309a-2: brtags la rdo rje khro bos gzir bar gyur bzhin
T02D2514:309a-3: du lho phyogs su khrid par gyur par bsam mo
T02D2514:309a-4: // de nyid la phyi'i cho ga bstan par bya
T02D2514:309a-5: ba'i phyir de'i rkang rjes zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2514:309a-6: // pa gsungs so // de ni 'di skad ston
T02D2514:309a-7: pa yin te rlung gis btsugs pa'i shing lo la
T02D2514:309a-8: khro bo'i sngags dang spel ba'i ming bris la de
T02D2514:309a-9: // pa gsungs so // dang / de'i rkang rjes
T02D2514:309a-10: kyis dang bsres la ming nas smos pa sngon du
T02D2514:309a-11: 'gro bas bkug la rdo rje sna yon gyi rkang
T02D2514:309a-13: de'i ming gsang sngags dang spel te zhes bya ba
T02D2514:309a-14: ni 'ug pa'i sgro la bsgrub par bya ba'i ming
T02D2514:309a-15: khro bo'i sngags dang spel te bris la dge sbyong
T02D2514:309a-16: dang bram ze'i skra yis de dkris la sa'i 'og
T02D2514:309a-17: tu brkos nas gzhug ste de gnyis khro bo gnyis
T02D2514:309a-18: kyis 'thab mo 'gyed par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2514:309a-19: des ni phan tshun 'bye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2514:309a-20: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus bskam par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2514:309a-21: h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te khro
T02D2514:309a-22: bo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas rang gi sna'i rtse
T02D2514:309a-23: mo la gnas pa'i h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje
T02D2514:309a-24: phra mo spros la bsgrub par bya ba bkang ste
T02D2514:309a-25: de'i yan lag gi tshigs thams cad du sna tshogs
T02D2514:309a-26: rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba bsams la /
T02D2514:309a-27: de 'bar bas lus bskams nas aom badzra d'a ki ni /
T02D2514:309a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bskul ba'i tshig sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D2514:309a-29: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams kyis khrag kun nas gzhibs par gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2514:309a-30: rlung bcing bar bya ba'i phyir mkhas pas rlung gi zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2514:309a-31: rlung gi phyogs su dri nag pos dkyil 'khor gru
T02D2514:309a-32: bzhi byas par thig le bdun re re zhing yi
T02D2514:309a-33: ge yas bskor bar byas la de'i steng du kham
T02D2514:309a-34: phor gyis dgab la de yang ri rab rtse mo
T02D2514:309a-36: dbus su lam gyis mtshan pa'i dbang chen gyi dkyil
T02D2514:309a-37: 'khor rdo rje chen pos mnan pa'i nang du rlung
T02D2514:309a-38: rnams nges par chud par bsams la gsang sngags brjod
T02D2514:309a-39: de 'di bya'o // char dbab pa'i phyir padma 'dab brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:309a-40: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris te de'i 'dab ma brgyad la mtha' yas dang rigs ldan dang /
T02D2514:309b-4: padma zhes bya ba gnyis gnyis shing nag po dang /
T02D2514:309b-8: aom sha la sa ha kha zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2514:309b-9: rkang pa nas brtsams te spyi bo'i bar du klu
T02D2514:309b-10: brgyad byin gyis brlab cing padma'i lte ba la mjug
T02D2514:309b-11: ma rnams gnas par byas la rang gi gnas nas
T02D2514:309b-12: bkug ste mchod nas khro ba'i gzugs 'bar ba'i phreng
T02D2514:309b-13: ba can du bdag nyid dbus su gnas la h'um
T02D2514:309b-14: n'am h'um zhes brjod cing rting pa'i mthil gyis gzir
T02D2514:309b-16: klu rnams kyang char 'babs pa la brtson par bsam mo //
T02D2514:309b-17: char bcas pa'i phyir nyi ma'i mdog ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:309b-18: bdag nyid nyi ma dmar po'i mdog dang 'dra ba'i 'od can gyi khro ba'i gzugs su bsams la /
T02D2514:309b-19: rang gi kha nam mkha'i tshad tsam la yi ge
T02D2514:309b-20: h'um gi 'bar bar gyur pa'i lce dang ldan pa
T02D2514:309b-21: gdangs te chus yongs su gang ba'i sprin bldags la
T02D2514:309b-22: dbugs kyis rngubs la dbugs phyung bas shing bal bzhin
T02D2514:309b-24: yang na rang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs kha nam mkha'i
T02D2514:309b-25: tshad tsam la lce 'bar ba gdangs la chus yongs
T02D2514:309b-26: su gang ba'i sprin bldags te dbugs kyis drangs la
T02D2514:309b-27: dbugs phyung bas shing bal bzhin du gtor bar bya'o
T02D2514:309b-28: // gal te yang rang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi 'bar ba btang bas /
T02D2514:309b-29: sprin bcad cing gtubs la h'um zhes bya bas bsdigs pa la brtson par bya'o //
T02D2514:309b-30: bgegs thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir me'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:309b-31: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas
T02D2514:309b-32: rang gi dpral ba las byung ba'i 'phags pa mi
T02D2514:309b-33: g-yo ba me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa phyag drug
T02D2514:309b-34: pa bsams te / de nyid khro bo grangs med
T02D2514:309b-35: pa dang bcas pas bgegs thams cad h'um gi sgra
T02D2514:309b-36: dang rab tu 'bar ba'i ral gris la sogs pa
T02D2514:309b-37: 'bebs pas bgegs rnams gzhig par bya'o //
T02D2514:309b-38: mi'i bgegs gzhom par bya ba'i phyir rkang rjes sa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:309b-39: mi'i rkang rjes kyi sa dang mi'i khrag gis bsgrub
T02D2514:309b-40: par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la mi rus kyi
T02D2514:310a-1: dag la 'od zer can gyi sngags nyi shu bzlas
T02D2514:310a-2: la gnyis kyis mig gnyis su phur bu btab la
T02D2514:310a-3: tshogs kyi bdag po'i khar bcug ste /
