T02D2514:310a-5: zhes brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje gtun shing gis rgyab nas brdung par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2514:310a-6: me mched pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir stang zil
T02D2514:310a-7: kha dog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2514:310a-8: / rang gi yi shes h'um dang spel ba las
T02D2514:310a-9: byung ba'i nam mkha' lding mdog nag po lus la
T02D2514:310a-10: klu stong gis khyab par bsams la /
T02D2514:310a-11: aom badzra n'a ra y'a na zhes bya ba las sogs pa dang /
T02D2514:310a-12: bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba des brgya byin bskul
T02D2514:310a-13: la 'di la yang sprin gyi tshogs las char dbab
T02D2514:310a-14: pa'i phyir bka' bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D2514:310a-15: bka' thos nas chu'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin rnams kyis
T02D2514:310a-16: me gsod pa la brtson par bsams la nam mkha'
T02D2514:310a-17: lding gis kyang gshog pa'i chu dang /
T02D2514:310a-18: mchus brkos pas chu klung gi mtshams byed par bsam mo //
T02D2514:310a-19: rdo rje thog thog bzlog par bya ba'i phyir zhal
T02D2514:310a-20: ras gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2514:310a-21: te / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhal ras gsum
T02D2514:310a-22: pa zla ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi pa 'od dmar
T02D2514:310a-23: po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa bsnyems
T02D2514:310a-24: ma la sogs lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba
T02D2514:310a-25: bdag nyid rnam par bsams la g-yas pas rdo rje
T02D2514:310a-27: lag pa g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa'i
T02D2514:310a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa phyung la spros
T02D2514:310a-29: te / nam mkha'i khams su sprin bzhin du khyab par bsams nas bsgrub par bya ba'am /
T02D2514:310a-30: aom ma h'a su kha badzra /
T02D2514:310a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam pa thams cad
T02D2514:310a-32: kyis brgyan pa'i rdo rje can du byin gyis brlabs
T02D2514:310a-33: la sangs rgyas rin po ches dbang bskur nas cod
T02D2514:310a-34: pan dang phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2514:310a-35: da ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po 'gro ba
T02D2514:310a-36: thams cad la gzigs nas smin ma mdzes par bskyod
T02D2514:310a-37: cing / 'dzum pa la sogs pa dang ldan par
T02D2514:310a-38: mdzad pa dang phyag na rdo rjes gzigs pa la
T02D2514:310a-40: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bka' stsal pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2514:310b-0: bsgom pa'i @310b lam las zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2514:310b-1: pa gsungs te sems can gyi dngos po gang yin
T02D2514:310b-2: pa'i dngos po rnams ni dngos po med la skye
T02D2514:310b-3: ba dang 'gag pa mtha' gnyis dang bral ba yin
T02D2514:310b-4: zhing de med pas dbu ma yang med do //
T02D2514:310b-5: de bas na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba yin na
T02D2514:310b-6: byang chub ji ltar mngon sum du bya ba'i thabs
T02D2514:310b-7: de bstan par bya ba'i phyir phung po zhes bya
T02D2514:310b-8: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:310b-9: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can gyi lha'i
T02D2514:310b-10: phung po dang gcig tu gyur par bsgoms pas sgom
T02D2514:310b-11: pa ni bsgom pa goms par byed pa'o //
T02D2514:310b-12: byang chub sems ni grogs 'gyur pas //
T02D2514:310b-13: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas so //
T02D2514:310b-14: sprul pa dang ni bsdu pa yis //
T02D2514:310b-15: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2514:310b-16: mchod par bya ba'i phyir sprul pa spro ba dang
T02D2514:310b-17: bsdu ba dag byed pa ste /
T02D2514:310b-18: de yang sems tsam yi pas de nyid kyi lha
T02D2514:310b-19: rnams kyi sku dang gsungs dang byang chub kyi mtshan
T02D2514:310b-20: nyid can gyi sems 'thob par 'gyur la de yang
T02D2514:310b-21: sgyu ma dang 'dra ste byang chub kyang de dang
T02D2514:310b-22: 'dra'o // sgyu ma lta bu las ji ltar na
T02D2514:310b-23: 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur zhen dper na zhes bya
T02D2514:310b-24: ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2514:310b-25: lhag ma dang bcas pa'i byang chub ni nyan thos
T02D2514:310b-26: la sogs pa ste phung po la sogs pa med
T02D2514:310b-27: pa'i phyir ro // lhag ma med pa yang sgrib
T02D2514:310b-28: pa'i bag chags dang bral bas bla na med pa'i
T02D2514:310b-29: pa'i phyir ro // byang chub bo // 'di nyid
T02D2514:310b-30: bskyed par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob tu te kho
T02D2514:310b-31: na nyid rnam pa bcu gsungs so //
T02D2514:310b-32: ji skad du bshad pa'i cho ga byas kyang ma
T02D2514:310b-33: grub na lha rnams tshar gcang par bya ba'i don
T02D2514:310b-34: du ji lta ba bzhin du phur bus gdab par
T02D2514:310b-35: bya ba'i phyir / der lcags kyus zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:310b-36: rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas rdo rje zhes pas bcings la /
T02D2514:310b-37: rdo rje nag mos sdigs mdzub byas la rdo rje khu tshur gyis phur bu bzung ste /
T02D2514:310b-38: rdo rje tho bas phur bu'i sngags gdon bzhin ru gnas lngar phur bus gdab par bya'o /
T02D2514:310b-41: // / dbab pa la sogs pa'i las bstan par bya
T02D2514:310b-42: ba'i phyir de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba
T02D2514:311a-2: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D2514:311a-3: dbab pa'i snod skul byed ma la sogs pa'i gzugs
T02D2514:311a-5: gnas ji lta bar gyur ba'i yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2514:311a-6: rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i rlung dang me'i
T02D2514:311a-7: dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rang gi rdo rje 'bar
T02D2514:311a-8: bar 'gyur bas 'bar bzhin par bltas la /
T02D2514:311a-9: rdo rje bsdams pa dang bcas pa'i dril bu bskyod
T02D2514:311a-10: cing gzengs bstod pa dang bcas par gsang sngags brjod
T02D2514:311a-11: na 'bar bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs se //
T02D2514:311a-12: gnas par bya ba'i don du sbyor pa bstan par
T02D2514:311a-13: bya ba'i phyir dbang chen dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba
T02D2514:311a-15: de ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02D2514:311a-16: ras la sogs pa la dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2514:311a-17: phyogs dang mtshams rnams su aom gyis mtshan par gi
T02D2514:311a-19: dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa a'a: sa mtshan pa bris te /
T02D2514:311a-20: lte pa la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um bzhi /
T02D2514:311a-21: mtha' ma bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang ldan pa bris la /
T02D2514:311a-22: da nas der de'i rnam par shes pa bkug nas
T02D2514:311a-23: kham phor ser po kha sbyor gyi nang du bcug
T02D2514:311a-24: ste steng du rdo rje 'chang bas mnan la bskul
T02D2514:311a-25: tshig dang bcas par h'um brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i
T02D2514:311a-26: rdo rje'i skud pas dkris la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2514:311a-27: dbang du bya ba'i phyir sngags la mkhas ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:311a-28: 'dod chags che dang ldan pa'i gzugs //
T02D2514:311a-29: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i 'dod chags te de'i gzugs can la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2514:311a-30: rdo rje sems dpar gyur nas rdo rje chags par gyur pa'o //
T02D2514:311a-31: dpyid ces bya ba ni me tog dri zhim pa'i phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2514:311a-32: 'dod pa dang 'dra ba ni me tog gi mda' dang gzhu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2514:311a-33: sku gsum ldan pa mda' thogs shing //
T02D2514:311a-34: zhes bya ba ni ltong dang dbus dang mde'u la
T02D2514:311a-35: aom la sogs pa gsum bkod pa'i mdas bsgrub par
T02D2514:311a-36: bya ba'i bud med kyi spyi bor chags pas mnan
T02D2514:311a-37: la mar sar bzhin du zags par gyur par bsams
T02D2514:311b-0: @311b zhing / 'dzag par bya ba'i phyir padma'i nang
T02D2514:311b-1: du zhugs pa'am yang na 'dod chags can mi 'dzag
T02D2514:311b-4: padma ni padma'i lte bar ro //
T02D2514:311b-6: bu mo zas sbyin ma dgug par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2514:311b-7: mi thod las byas zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2514:311b-8: gsungs te / mi thod las byas cang te'u la //
T02D2514:311b-9: zhes bya ba ni mi thod las byas pa'o //
T02D2514:311b-10: g-yogs nas ni zhes bya ba ni kha spre'u'i pags pas g-yogs pa'o //
T02D2514:311b-11: bud med khrag gis mdzes par bya //
T02D2514:311b-12: zhes bya ba ni bud med kyi zla mtshan gyis
T02D2514:311b-13: ngos gnyi ga la yang padma bris pas mdzes pa'o
T02D2514:311b-14: // bris te zhes ba ni bud med kyi khrag nyid kyis padma'i lte ba gnyis su'o //
T02D2514:311b-15: mi yi skra yis btags nas ni //
T02D2514:311b-16: zhes bya ba ni dur khrod kyi skra blangs pas rus pa gnyis bcing zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2514:311b-17: dkyil 'khor bri zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo lam
T02D2514:311b-18: gyi bzhi mdor rkang pa g-yon pa'i mthe bos dkyil
T02D2514:311b-19: 'khor zur bzhi pa la mtshams rnams su rdo rje
T02D2514:311b-20: lcags kyu bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o
T02D2514:311b-21: // brdung zhes bya ba'i bar du ni de la
T02D2514:311b-22: gnas nas rkang pa g-yon ba'i rting pas 'gugs shing
T02D2514:311b-23: ming brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D2514:311b-24: khrom h'um zhes brjod cing thing ril gyi rkang ba'i
T02D2514:311b-25: rus pas sgra dbyung ba'i phyir brdungs na bu mo
T02D2514:311b-27: rnal 'byor pa 'khor lo rdzogs par gyur pas bltas pa dang /
T02D2514:311b-28: tshig tsam gyis kyang mngon par dad pa'i 'bras bu
T02D2514:311b-29: thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya
T02D2514:311b-30: ba'i phyir gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba la
T02D2514:311b-32: sbyin sreg gi las bstan par bya ba'i phyir sbyin sreg ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:311b-33: dge ba yi ni las rnams byed //
T02D2514:311b-34: ces bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang
T02D2514:311b-35: dbang du bya ba ni g-yas su gtsubs pa las
T02D2514:311b-37: mngon spyod la ni dur khrod las byung ba'i me las bya'o //
T02D2514:311b-38: thab khung zhes bya ba ni zlum po dang zur
T02D2514:311b-39: bzhi dang zla gam dang zur gsum pa'i thab khung
T02D2514:311b-40: gi dbus su gnas pa'i dkar po dang /
T02D2514:312a-1: nag po'i padma la gzhag pa'i gtsug tor dang /
T02D2514:312a-4: 'bang ba'i rdo rje de nyid kyi mdog can bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2514:312a-5: las kun byed pas bzlas nas su //
T02D2514:312a-6: zhes bya ba ni h'um gis mngon par bzlas pa'o //
T02D2514:312a-7: lag g-yon rdo rje zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje rtse gsum par byas pa'o //
T02D2514:312a-8: las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D2514:312a-9: ces bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las
T02D2514:312a-10: kyi mchog gi 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes par 'gyur
T02D2514:312a-11: pa'o // 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya //
T02D2514:312a-12: zhes bya ba ni 'bar pas lha 'bar ba'i gzugs
T02D2514:312a-13: kyis de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes ngo bo nyid
T02D2514:312a-14: du 'gyur bar bya'o// aom zhes pa dang sv'a h'a'i mtha' //
T02D2514:312a-15: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang
T02D2514:312a-16: dbang rnams la ni gsang sngags gzhan gyis mi thos
T02D2514:312a-18: mngon spyod la ni h'um dang phat bcas shing khro
T02D2514:312a-19: bo'i tshig gis thog ma dang tha mar dgang blugs
T02D2514:312a-20: dbul bar bya'o // zhal bkang nas zhes gsungs pas
T02D2514:312a-21: lha rnams kyi zhal gyi padmar sbyin sreg dbul lo
T02D2514:312a-22: dbul bar bya'o // // bshang gci la sogs pas
T02D2514:312a-23: sbyin sreg byas pas sdig par 'gyur ro zhes som
T02D2514:312a-24: nyi skye bar mi bya ste /
T02D2514:312a-25: gang gi phyir 'di dag thams cad rnam par rtog
T02D2514:312a-26: pa tsam yin gyi don dam par ngo bo nyid
T02D2514:312a-27: kyis dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2514:312a-28: de bas na dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms par 'jug pas kyang /
T02D2514:312a-29: lha'i nga rgyal sngon du 'gro bas thabs dang shes
T02D2514:312a-30: rab ro gcig pa mngon gsum du byas na zag
T02D2514:312a-31: pa med pa'i ye shes skyed pa yin no //
T02D2514:312a-32: sku la sogs pa'i dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2514:312a-33: las las byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2514:312a-34: las las byung ba rnams bstan pa'i //
T02D2514:312a-35: zhes bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnams kyis so //
T02D2514:312a-36: sha dang rkang la sogs pa rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2514:312a-37: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo yin te de bas na bsten par bya'o //
T02D2514:312a-38: gang yang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i
T02D2514:312a-39: 'du byed rnams 'phel ba'i bshang gci la sogs pa
T02D2514:312a-40: 'dzag pa rnam ba lnga ni sa la sogs pa
T02D2514:312a-41: 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2514:312a-42: bsgom pa'i blo gros rdzogs pha yis //
T02D2514:312a-43: zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang bral bar gyur pa'o //
T02D2514:312b-0: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba @312b
T02D2514:312b-1: la sogs pa gsungs pa ni sgrub pa chen po
T02D2514:312b-2: bsgrub pa la sogs pa bstan pa yin te /
T02D2514:312b-3: ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob cing 'khor lo la
T02D2514:312b-4: sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog la dmigs pa'i ting nge
T02D2514:312b-5: 'dzin gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D2514:312b-6: // rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2514:312b-7: zhes bya ba ni spyan dang ldan pa'i rtog pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas so //
T02D2514:312b-8: 'khor lo bsgrub par bya zhes bya bas ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02D2514:312b-9: 'khor lo bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ston du bsnyen pa byas la /
T02D2514:312b-10: rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rang gi mtshan
T02D2514:312b-11: nyid ji lta ba dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo gzhag
T02D2514:312b-12: ste / 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa
T02D2514:312b-13: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sku gsum rdo
T02D2514:312b-14: rje can gyi gzugs 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i
T02D2514:312b-15: 'od dang ldan pa snyoms par 'jug pa las byung
T02D2514:312b-16: la 'khor lo nang du zhugs par bsgoms te /
T02D2514:312b-17: ji srid du zhugs nas 'bar par gyur pa de srid du bsgoms la /
T02D2514:312b-18: de rang gi spyan gyi rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du blang bar bya'o //
T02D2514:312b-19: de bzhin du ci rigs par mi bskyod pa la
T02D2514:312b-20: sogs pa'i sgom pas rdo rje la sogs pa bsgrub
T02D2514:312b-21: pa yang nyams su blang bar bya'o //
T02D2514:312b-22: 'di nyid kyi sku gsum dbye ba'i rang gi ngo
T02D2514:312b-23: bo bstan par bya ba'i phyir rim pa bzhin du
T02D2514:312b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2514:312b-25: las kyi phyag rgya ni lcags kyu la sogs pa'am
T02D2514:312b-26: sngar bshad pa'i mtshan ma thams cad kyang phyogs gcig
T02D2514:312b-27: bstan pa'i nye bar mtshon pas bdag po'i sbyor ba
T02D2514:312b-28: dang ldan pas 'khor lo dang 'dra ba lcags kyu
T02D2514:312b-29: la sogs pa grub par bya ba'i phyir 'dir sku
T02D2514:312b-30: la sogs pa nang du gzhug par bya'o zhes bstan
T02D2514:312b-32: 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa spyan la sogs
T02D2514:312b-33: pa'i gzugs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir sa ni
T02D2514:312b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2514:312b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
T02D2514:312b-36: gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la
T02D2514:312b-38: gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba ni de bzhin
T02D2514:312b-39: gshegs pa thams cad bum pa'i nang du zhugs nas
T02D2514:312b-40: bde ba chen por zhu bar gyur par rnam par
T02D2514:312b-41: bsams la de spyan la sogs pas thogs te /
T02D2514:312b-42: 'khor lo chen po dbang bskur ba //
T02D2514:312b-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02D2514:313a-1: kyi bdag nyid la slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2514:313a-2: rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dam tshig ste rgyu
T02D2514:313a-3: de nyid la dmigs pa'i ring nge 'dzin gang yin
T02D2514:313a-4: ba de la'ang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2514:313a-5: de nyid 'phags pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2514:313a-6: cad kyi ye shes kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang
T02D2514:313a-8: gang du yang mi gnas so zhes bya ba ni de rnams bskyed pa nyid du med pas so //
T02D2514:313a-9: stang stabs ni g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2514:313a-10: 'dug stangs ni rdo rje'i skyil mo krung la sogs pa'o //
T02D2514:313a-11: las la sbyor ba ni srung ba dang spyan drang ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2514:313a-12: slar bsdu ba ni mchod pa dang bstod pa bya
T02D2514:313a-13: ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas gshegs su
T02D2514:313a-14: gsol ba'o // gsang ba dang gsang chen nyid ye
T02D2514:313a-15: shes yin la de nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste
T02D2514:313a-16: gsol ba'o // / bla na med pa'i 'bras bu
T02D2514:313a-17: bskyed pas na snying po ste de nyid bstan par
T02D2514:313a-18: gsol ba'o // / bya ba'i phyir / rnal 'byor
T02D2514:313a-19: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te rnal 'byor
T02D2514:313a-20: ni byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid
T02D2514:313a-22: de bas na gang gis spyor ba de ni lhag
T02D2514:313a-23: pa'i rnal 'byor te spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo'i
T02D2514:313a-24: khyad par ro // de dag ni snyoms par 'jug
T02D2514:313a-25: pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rnal 'byor ni rnal 'byor
T02D2514:313a-26: khyad par ro // chen po'o // yang na lhag
T02D2514:313a-27: pa'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po 'di'i nang
T02D2514:313a-28: du chud pa sngon du 'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor lha
T02D2514:313a-29: rnams kyi nga rgyal te 'di dag ni go rims
T02D2514:313a-30: bzhin du sems can rnams la bshad par bya'o //
T02D2514:313a-31: bshad pa 'di ni legs bris las //
T02D2514:313a-32: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02D2514:313a-33: des ni rab zhi bshes gnyen bcas //
T02D2514:313a-34: 'jig rten rdo rje 'dzin par shog / rgyud kyi
T02D2514:313a-35: rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dka' 'grel slob dpon
T02D2514:313a-36: rab tu zhi ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D2514:313a-38: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddha ka ra wa
T02D2514:313a-39: rma dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong
